titles: The legend of great Cromvvel. By Michael Drayton Esquier
author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by I. Flasket, dwelling in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the black Beare,
notes: Running title reads: The legend of great Cromwell.
